original_text: So you should tell each other about any wrong things that you have done. Then you will be able to pray for each other, so that God makes you well again. When a good person prays to God, God does powerful things.
korean_text: 그러므로 너희 죄를 서로 고백하며 병이 낫기를 위하여 서로 기도하라 의인의 간구는 역사하는 힘이 큼이니라

sentences.original_text: So you should tell each other
about any wrong things that you have done
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 행한 어떤 잘못된 것들에 대해

sentences.original_text: Then you will be able to pray for each other
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 너희는 서로를 위해 기도할 수 있을 것이다

sentences.original_text: so that God makes you well again
When a good person prays to God
